verbs.description: A bar in Singapore [V: has] made cocktails in honor of the Trump - Kim Jong Un summit . Trump 's is made with Kentucky bourbon .
[ARG0: A bar in Singapore] has [V: made] [ARG1: cocktails] [ARGM-ADV: in honor of the Trump - Kim Jong Un summit] . Trump 's is made with Kentucky bourbon .
A bar in Singapore has made cocktails in honor of the Trump - Kim Jong Un summit . Trump 's [V: is] made with Kentucky bourbon .
A bar in Singapore has made cocktails in honor of the Trump - Kim Jong Un summit . [ARG1: Trump 's] is [V: made] [ARG2: with Kentucky bourbon] .
